Question.name: Party
Question.object: Talk about awesome parties you've been to.
Wanna go clubbing?!
Do you want to go to a party tonight?
Play an intense game of pong

Question.name: Athletics
Question.object: Talk about how much you can bench.
Hey do you wanna go to the gym with me?!
Discuss the recent Hockey match.
Challenge her to a rousing game of Ping-Pong

Question.name: Art
Question.object: ART IS FUN RIGHT!?!
Do you want to paint a picture together?
What famous artists do you like?
Brag about your incredible art skills.

Question.name: Games
Question.object: Talk about your favorite games.
Challenge her to a game of Solitaire.
Have you ever played TICKET TO RIDE?
Play hide and seek.

Question.name: World Culture
Question.object: Talk about your favorite state capital.
Invite her over to show off your figurines from Japan.
Sooth her with your fluent knowledge of French.
Tell her about climbing Mt. Everest.

Question.name: Cooking
Question.object: Talk about your favorite foods.
Invite to bake a cake together.
Share cooking recipes.
Offer her the cookie you baked yourself.

Question.name: Video Games
Question.object: Brag about your amazing rank in League of Legends.
Hey, let's 1v1 in melee.
Talk about wavedashing, L-Cancelling, and tech-chasing.
Challenge her to Astral Gun.

Question.name: Drugs
Question.object: Share experiences on how awesome weed is.
Wanna smoke a joint with me later?
ALDJFalgbjatljr... I"m high.
Hehehehehheeeee... hehe.
